pages.text: You've found a rare $(bold)Bell of Secrets!$() This bell will play a 4 note chime when rung. However, it will play an extended 8 note chime if there is an unopened treasure chest nearby! Try ringing it in every room of a dungeon.
Due to the magical nature of the bell, it only works in the dungeon dimension. The bell is strangely silent in all other dimensions.
